name: Necromancers' Arena
description:
Cute meets creepy in this twin-stick-shooter mayhem!
Up to four players can join forces or battle against each other within multiple arenas.
Use a variety of items and spells to defeat hordes of wicked monsters.
But shooting isn't all; raise the dead to fight for you and triumph!
Ten different elements to master:
Fire, Frost, Zap, Love, Shadow, Light, Blood, Soul, Plague and Venom -- each with unique added effects to spells and conditional damage multipliers!
Several unique thematic arenas to test your skills and strategies, each with a mighty arena champion at the end.
